channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My father-in-law has dementia and is moving in with us. Can we invoice him for a caregiver?
item.description: “Do we have an obligation to provide my wife’s troubled sibling with an accounting of my father-in-law’s expenses?”

item.title: QwenLong-L1 solves long-context reasoning challenge that stumps current LLMs
item.description: Alibaba's QwenLong-L1 helps LLMs deeply understand long documents, unlocking advanced reasoning for practical enterprise applications.

item.title: My life partner is 18 years my senior. He wants to leave his $4.5 million fortune to me — not his two kids. Do we tell them?
item.description: “No doubt they would feel the arrangement is unfair, and that would potentially end our relationship.”

item.title: My friend is getting divorced. Her husband kindly said, ‘Take the house.’ Is there a catch?
item.description: “After my friend said that perhaps she’ll just settle for the house, her husband agreed and moved to file for divorce quickly.”

item.title: Indy Autonomous Challenge coming to California
item.description: The Indy Autonomous Challenge will feature racecars driven by AI developed by university teams at the Laguna Seca in July. The post Indy Autonomous Ch...

item.title: My husband and I earn $115K. We’re inheriting $300K. Should we invest in real estate or stock?
item.description: “We have $40,000 in credit-card debt and two financed vehicles with $100,000 in debt combined.”

item.title: Trump’s playbook may be tossed, but higher tariffs are here to stay — one way or another
item.description: Is Trump’s trade strategy in limbo? Yes, but ‘Tariff Man’ has options.

item.title: SS Innovations reaches 4,000 robotic surgeries with SSi Mantra robotic system
item.description: Since SS Innovations began selling SSi Mantra in August 2022, it has installed 80 robotic surgical systems in 75 hospitals. The post SS Innovations re...

item.title: The future of engineering belongs to those who build with AI, not without it
item.description: As we look ahead, the relationship between engineers and AI systems will likely evolve from tool and user to something more symbiotic.

item.title: Micro Center nerd store fills the Fry’s vacuum with its return to Silicon Valley
item.description: Micro Center, an electronics retailer, has opened a store in Silicon Valley in California And so the nerd kingdom has returned.

item.title: Which LLM should you use? Token Monster automatically combines multiple models and tools for you
item.description: This architecture lets Token Monster tap into a range of models from different providers without having to build separate integrations for each one.

item.title: Industry experts share their outlook on the future of AMRs
item.description: 3Laws' Andrew Singletary and Vanderlande's Jake Heldenberg share their insights on the latest trends in the AMR market. The post Industry experts shar...

item.title: 100 XCMG autonomous mining trucks begin operating in Inner Mongolia
item.description: XCMG says its all-electric, autonomous mining truck fleet is weather-resistant and allows for rapid battery swapping. The post 100 XCMG autonomous min...

item.title: First robot boxing match; Persona AI developing industrial humanoid
item.description: Nicolaus Radford provides updates on his new company, Persona AI, and its journey to building an industrial humanoid. The post First robot boxing matc...

item.title: Fueling seamless AI at scale
item.description: From large language models (LLMs) to reasoning agents, today’s AI tools bring unprecedented computational demands. Trillion-parameter models, workload...

item.title: ElevenLabs debuts Conversational AI 2.0 voice assistants that understand when to pause, speak, and take turns talking
item.description: With Conversational AI 2.0, ElevenLabs aims to provide tools and infrastructure for truly intelligent, context-aware enterprise voice agents.

item.title: The Download: sycophantic LLMs, and the AI Hype Index

item.title: This benchmark used Reddit’s AITA to test how much AI models suck up to us
item.description: Back in April, OpenAIannounced it was rolling back an update to its GPT-4o model that made ChatGPT’s responses to user queries too sycophantic. An AI ...
